code: ag5_download(variable = "2m_temperature",              statistic = "night_time_minimum",              day = "all",              month = "all",              year = 2015,              path = "C:/custom_target_folder"              )

See details available options. path Character Target folder local hardrive e.g. "C:/agera5". folder exist user write permission.
